body: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.
author: Jane Austen

body: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times.
author: Charles Dickens

body: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
author: Leo Tolstoy

body: To be or not to be, that is the question.
author: William Shakespeare

body: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
author: J.K. Rowling
